title: 1969–70 European Cup Winners' Cup
text:
The 1969–70 season of the <a href="UEFA%20Cup%20Winners%27%20Cup">European Cup Winners' Cup</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club tournament was won by <a href="Manchester%20City%20F.C.">Manchester City</a> in a final victory against <a href="G%C3%B3rnik%20Zabrze">Górnik Zabrze</a>.
First round.
Second leg.
"Rangers won 2–0 on aggregate."
Semi-finals.
Second leg.
"3–3 on aggregate."
"Manchester City won 5–2 on aggregate."
Play-off.
"Górnik Zabrze won on a coin toss."
